name: Fava Bean Salad
keywords: almonds, fava beans, garlic, spring, vegetarian
recipeIngredient: 6 pounds fava beans (or lima beans), shelled, blanched 2 minutes, run under cold water and popped out of the tough outer skins (3 cups)
4 ounces Parmesan cheese, broken into bite-size chunks
Salt and freshly ground black pepper to taste

recipeInstructions.text: Toss all ingredients and marinate overnight at room temperature or for 2 days in the refrigerator
